divs: sighting detailsentered my back yard at approximately 10:00pm and observed a triangular shaped object to the n-w of my yard moving slowly and quietly toward the south and then stop. i had watched the object for approximately 1-min when i turned to my attention to my a\c unit for no more than 5 seconds then returned my attention to the object to find that it was gone. i observed the sky in all directions but could no longer see the object.
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around August 14th 2013
Summary: Travled south slowly, then hovered, I looked away for no more than 5 second then looked back and it was gone.
